Package org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.reporting.freemarker

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FindFilesNotClassifiedOrHinted
    Finds the files that have not had ClassificationModels linked, and also does not have FileLocationModels linked.
    FindSourceFilesByClassNameMethod
    A Freemarker method for finding a source for a class by it's name.
    GroupHintsByFile
    A function that groups the hints so they do not appear multiple times per a single file.
    IterableHasContent
    Returns whether an Iterable has values within it.
    ProjectModelToSha1
    Returns the SHA1 hash of the given a ProjectModel.
    RenderApplicationPieChartDirective
    Renders a JavaScript block that calls Flot.
    RenderLinkDirective
    Renders linkable elements as a list of links.
    SortDependencyArchivesByPathMethod
    Takes a list of DependencyReportToArchiveEdgeModel and orders them according to their path.
    SortDependencyGroupArchiveByPathMethod
    Takes a list of and orders them according to their path.
